newsitem.title: USA: NeoRx, Schwarz Pharma in deal.
newsitem.headline: NeoRx, Schwarz Pharma in deal.

text.p: NeoRx Corp said it has granted Schwarz Pharma AG North American marketing rights of its Biostent device for restenosis, or the reclosing of the arteries following balloon angioplasty.
In exchange, Schwarz Pharma will fund the future development of the product.
NeoRx said it will retain manufacturing rights on a worldwide basis as well as marketing rights for territories outside North America and Europe.

Depending on progress with product development, NeoRx can receive up to $30 million in license fees and milestone payments. Schwarz Pharma's direct funding of future development is estimated at an additional $30 million, the companies said.
NeoRx will also receive fees based on future sales and profits from manufacturing the product.
